meanings.definition: A device used in photography to produce a flash of light.
meanings.sent1: The photographer used flashtubes to capture a bright image.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to replace the flashtubes in the camera for better lighting.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flashtubes break up with the camera? They needed some space!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a burst of flashtubes.
meanings.sent5: The flashtubes illuminated the dark room, revealing hidden details.

meanings.definition: Tubes filled with gas that emit a bright flash of light when electricity is passed through them.
meanings.sent1: The flashtubes in the studio flickered before shining brightly.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully handled the delicate flashtubes during installation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flashtubes go to school? To get a little brighter!
meanings.sent4: The flashtubes danced with electricity, painting the room in light.
meanings.sent5: The flashtubes burst into brilliance, capturing the perfect moment in time.
